Package vendingmachine

Class VendingMachineView

java.lang.Object
vendingmachine.VendingMachineView
public class VendingMachineView extends Object
The VendingMachineView class represents the graphical user interface (GUI) for a vending machine. It includes components such as buttons, labels, text fields, and panels for displaying and controlling the vending machine's items and interactions.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    VendingMachineView()
    Constructs the VendingMachineView by initializing the main frame and its components.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • VendingMachineView

      public VendingMachineView()
      Constructs the VendingMachineView by initializing the main frame and its components. It sets up the mainPanel, controlFrame, and coinsFrame, and initializes the various GUI components. The vending machine view includes buttons for items, text areas for display, and control buttons for user interactions.

  • Method Details

    • removeAddedPanels

      public void removeAddedPanels()
      Removes the previously added item panels from the items button, price, and label panels in the vending machine's UI. This method is used to reset the items panel to its default state before updating it with new items.

    • updatePriceLabel

      public void updatePriceLabel(double itemPrice, int slotNumber)
      Updates the price label for a specific item slot in the vending machine's UI.
      Parameters:
      itemPrice - The new price of the item for the specified slot.
      slotNumber - The slot number for which the price label needs to be updated.

    • getMainFrame

      public JFrame getMainFrame()
      Retrieves the main JFrame of the vending machine.
      Returns:
      The main JFrame representing the vending machine's user interface.

    • setItemsPanelVisible

      public void setItemsPanelVisible(boolean isVisible)
      Sets the visibility of the items panels in the main frame of the vending machine.
      Parameters:
      isVisible - If true, the items panels will be set to visible. If false, they will be hidden.

    • setSpecialPanelVisible

      public void setSpecialPanelVisible(boolean isVisible)
      Sets the visibility of the special panels in the main frame of the vending machine.
      Parameters:
      isVisible - If true, the special panels will be set to visible. If false, they will be hidden.

    • setCustomPanelVisible

      public void setCustomPanelVisible(boolean isVisible)
      Sets the visibility of the custom panels in the main frame of the vending machine.
      Parameters:
      isVisible - If true, the custom panels will be set to visible. If false, they will be hidden.

    • updateCokeItem

      public void updateCokeItem()
      Updates the items panel to display the "Coke" item. This method adds the "Coke" item's components to the items panels.

    • updateCoffeeItem

      public void updateCoffeeItem()
      Updates the items panel to display the "Coffee" item. This method adds the "Coffee" item's components to the items panels.

    • setCrustPanelVisible

      public void setCrustPanelVisible(boolean isVisible)

      Parameters:
      isVisible - If true, the crust panels will be set to visible. If false, they will be hidden.
